name: Treasure Bolt
summary:
Treasure Bolt is a puzzle game designed to test your mental and physical capabilities in Virtual Reality (while against the clock!) Featuring support for full locomotion with the HTC VIVE Tracker. This means you can run, crawl, reach, hit and grab in Virtual Reality without teleportation! 
 
The game was originally designed as a locomotion tool to showcase the HTC VIVE Trackers, winning 2nd place in the 2017 Global VR Hackathon in Shanghai. This game is perfect for demonstrating the capabilities of the HTC Vive trackers, with support for up to 2 Vive Trackers plus controllers. 
 
This game is perfect for anybody who wants to experience the capabilities of the HTC Vive trackers, full body locomotion movement, or an intense puzzle time-trial. Built to support demonstrations and events.
